pullrequest.title: Add basic support for Image output types

content.raw:
I’ve removed the changes in AO & DO \(as well as a similar line in IMAGE\). It doesn’t seem to have changed anything, everything still works fine :slight_smile: 

I remember looking into saving front\_panel\_settings and it being impossible at the time due to the value having to be stored as a string in the h5 file. I can’t remember, but I assume that the remote value checking wasn’t implemented since we don’t have a front panel setting to check against?
content.html:
I’ve removed the changes in AO & DO (as well as a similar line in IMAGE). It doesn’t seem to have changed anything, everything still works fine

I remember looking into saving front_panel_settings and it being impossible at the time due to the value having to be stored as a string in the h5 file. I can’t remember, but I assume that the remote value checking wasn’t implemented since we don’t have a front panel setting to check against?
